div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1634 Egypt, before 1879 (361) Burial: 500 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AR Aeneia: 1 tetradr. Terone: 1 tetradr. Bisaltae: 1 octadr. Thraco-Maced.: 1 octadr. Disposition: London 3 (BMCMacedonia p. 107, no. 3; p. 141, no. 3; p. 151, no. 2); Berlin 1? Regling, ZfN 1927, p. 5, note 1 (Berlin Aeneia specimen possibly but not certainly from this find)
